00023     private boolean hasChangeLogLock = false;

00033     public static LockHandler getInstance(Database database) {
00034         if (!instances.containsKey(database)) {
00035             instances.put(database, new LockHandler(database));
00036         }
00037         return instances.get(database);

00040     public boolean acquireLock() throws LockException {
00041         try {
00042             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogLockTable();
00043 
00044             Boolean locked;
00045             try {
00046                 locked = (Boolean) database.getJdbcTemplate().queryForObject(database.getSelectChangeLogLockSQL(), Boolean.class);
00047             } catch (JDBCException e) {
00048                 if (!database.getJdbcTemplate().executesStatements()) {
00049                     //expected
00050                     locked = false;
00051                 } else {
00052                     throw new LockException("Error checking database lock status", e);
00053                 }
00054             }
00055             if (locked) {
00056                 return false;
00057             } else {
00058                 UpdateStatement updateStatement = new UpdateStatement(database.getDefaultSchemaName(), database.getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName());
00059                 updateStatement.addNewColumnValue("LOCKED", true);
00060                 updateStatement.addNewColumnValue("LOCKGRANTED", new Timestamp(new java.util.Date().getTime()));
00061                 InetAddress localHost = NetUtil.getLocalHost();
00062                 updateStatement.addNewColumnValue("LOCKEDBY", localHost.getHostName() + " (" + localHost.getHostAddress() + ")");
00063                 updateStatement.setWhereClause("ID  = 1");
00064 
00065                 database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("Lock Database");
00066                 int rowsUpdated = database.getJdbcTemplate().update(updateStatement);
00067                 if (rowsUpdated != 1) {
00068                     if (!database.getJdbcTemplate().executesStatements()) {
00069                         //expected
00070                     } else {
00071                         throw new LockException("Did not update change log lock correctly");
00072                     }
00073                 }
00074                 database.commit();
00075                 LogFactory.getLogger().info("Successfully acquired change log lock");
00076 
00077                 hasChangeLogLock = true;
00078                 return true;
00079             }
00080         } catch (Exception e) {
00081             throw new LockException(e);
00082         }
00083 
00084     }

00086     public void releaseLock() throws LockException {
00087         try {
00088             if (database.doesChangeLogLockTableExist()) {
00089                 UpdateStatement releaseStatement = new UpdateStatement(database.getDefaultSchemaName(), database.getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName());
00090                 releaseStatement.addNewColumnValue("LOCKED", false);
00091                 releaseStatement.addNewColumnValue("LOCKGRANTED", null);
00092                 releaseStatement.addNewColumnValue("LOCKEDBY", null);
00093                 releaseStatement.setWhereClause(" ID = 1");
00094 
00095                 database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("Release Database Lock");
00096                 int updatedRows = database.getJdbcTemplate().update(releaseStatement);
00097                 if (updatedRows != 1) {
00098                     if (database.getJdbcTemplate().executesStatements()) {
00099                         throw new LockException("Did not update change log lock correctly.\n\n" + releaseStatement + " updated " + updatedRows + " instead of the expected 1 row.");
00100                     }
00101                 }
00102                 database.commit();
00103                 hasChangeLogLock = false;
00104 
00105                 instances.remove(this.database);
00106 
00107                 LogFactory.getLogger().info("Successfully released change log lock");
00108             }
00109         } catch (Exception e) {
00110             throw new LockException(e);
00111         }
00112     }

00114     public DatabaseChangeLogLock[] listLocks() throws LockException {
00115         try {
00116             if (!database.doesChangeLogLockTableExist()) {
00117                 return new DatabaseChangeLogLock[0];
00118             }
00119 
00120             List<DatabaseChangeLogLock> allLocks = new ArrayList<DatabaseChangeLogLock>();
00121             RawSqlStatement sqlStatement = new RawSqlStatement((("SELECT ID, LOCKED, LOCKGRANTED, LOCKEDBY FROM " + database.escapeTableName(database.getDefaultSchemaName(), database.getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName()))));
00122             List<Map> rows = database.getJdbcTemplate().queryForList(sqlStatement);
00123             for (Map columnMap : rows) {
00124                 Object lockedValue = columnMap.get("LOCKED");
00125                 Boolean locked;
00126                 if (lockedValue instanceof Number) {
00127                     locked = ((Number) lockedValue).intValue() == 1;
00128                 } else {
00129                     locked = (Boolean) lockedValue;
00130                 }
00131                 if (locked != null && locked) {
00132                     allLocks.add(new DatabaseChangeLogLock(((Number) columnMap.get("ID")).intValue(), (Date) columnMap.get("LOCKGRANTED"), (String) columnMap.get("LOCKEDBY")));
00133                 }
00134             }
00135             return allLocks.toArray(new DatabaseChangeLogLock[allLocks.size()]);
00136         } catch (Exception e) {
00137             throw new LockException(e);
00138         }
00139     }

00141     public void waitForLock() throws LockException {
00142         if (hasChangeLogLock) {
00143             return;
00144         }
00145 
00146         try {
00147             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogLockTable();
00148 
00149             boolean locked = false;
00150             long timeToGiveUp = new Date().getTime() + changeLogLockWaitTime;
00151             while (!locked && new Date().getTime() < timeToGiveUp) {
00152                 locked = acquireLock();
00153                 if (!locked) {
00154                     System.out.println("Waiting for changelog lock....");
00155                     try {
00156                         Thread.sleep(1000 * 10);
00157                     } catch (InterruptedException e) {
00158                         ;
00159                     }
00160                 }
00161             }
00162 
00163             if (!locked) {
00164                 DatabaseChangeLogLock[] locks = listLocks();
00165                 String lockedBy;
00166                 if (locks.length > 0) {
00167                     DatabaseChangeLogLock lock = locks[0];
00168                     lockedBy = lock.getLockedBy() + " since " + DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance(DateFormat.SHORT, DateFormat.SHORT).format(lock.getLockGranted());
00169                 } else {
00170                     lockedBy = "UNKNOWN";
00171                 }
00172                 throw new LockException("Could not acquire change log lock.  Currently locked by " + lockedBy);
00173             }
00174         } catch (JDBCException e) {
00175             if (!database.getJdbcTemplate().executesStatements()) {
00176                 ; //nothing to do
00177             } else {
00178                 throw new LockException(e);
00179             }
00180         }
00181     }

00186     public void forceReleaseLock() throws LockException, JDBCException {
00187         database.checkDatabaseChangeLogLockTable();
00188 
00189         releaseLock();
00190     }
